descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Marcus Morris Sr. knocks down a 3-pointer in the corner despite being fouled.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Morris fouled on triple for 4-point play) 2021/2/15 ESHEET

videos.headline: Morris fouled on triple for 4-point play

videos.description: Tyler Herro hoists a quick free throw, which misses, as substitutions are being made, and the referees rule the shot as his first attempt.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Herro tries and fails to sneak in practice free throw) 2021/02/16 ESHEET

videos.headline: Herro tries and fails to sneak in practice free throw

videos.description: Ivica Zubac lobs the ball between defenders to a driving Terance Mann, who slams it down and gets full approval from his teammates.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Clippers bench lights up as Mann flushes dunk) 2021/02/16 ESHEET

videos.headline: Clippers bench lights up as Mann flushes dunk
